mapper.insert: insert into ST_PUMP_B (STCD, EQPNO, Name, Type, Direction, Power, Flow, Memo, RunTime) values (#{STCD,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{EQPNO,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{direction,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{power,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flow,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{memo,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{runTime,jdbcType=NVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select STCD, EQPNO, Name, Type, Direction, Power, Flow, Memo, RunTime from ST_PUMP_B where STCD = #{STCD,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} and EQPNO = #{EQPNO,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}
select STCD, EQPNO, Name, Type, Direction, Power, Flow, Memo, RunTime from ST_PUMP_B
select STCD, EQPNO, Name, Type, Direction, Power, Flow, Memo, RunTime from ST_PUMP_B where STCD = #{stcd}
